ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | mul2lt0.1 | |- ( ph -> A e. RR ) |

| 4 | 1 | #P_recnd | |- ( ph -> A e. CC ) |
| 5 | 2 | #P_recnd | |- ( ph -> B e. CC ) |

| 7 | 6, 3 | #P_eqbrtrrd | |- ( ph -> ( B x. A ) < 0 ) |
| 8 | 2, 1, 7 | #P_mul2lt0rlt0 | |- ( ( ph /\ A < 0 ) -> 0 < B ) |
